snippet: Alabama has hired another former Southern California head coach as offensive coordinator, turning to Steve Sarkisian to once again replace Lane Kiffin....
lead_paragraph: Alabama has hired another former Southern California head coach as offensive coordinator, turning to Steve Sarkisian to once again replace Lane Kiffin.

headline.main: Alabama Names Ex-USC Coach Sarkisian Offensive Coordinator
headline.print_headline: Alabama Names Ex-USC Coach Sarkisian Offensive Coordinator
